He is unhappy with his present life which is monotonous and feels that he should lives a modernized life which he has missed in his earlier life.

Title: Marumunai
Review Data: Kathir (Maruthi), a medical college student from a poor family, falls in love with Charumathi (Mrudhula Bhaskar), a rich girl. As expected, their parents oppose their love and as a result, the young couple decide to die together if they can't live together. They elope with the intention of committing suicide. But when the time comes, only Charu takes the extreme step. Kathir refrains for a reason...

Title: Connect
Review Data: The announcement of a nation-wide lock-down due to the spread of COVID-19 pandemic disrupts the peace of a family. What follows is a series of bizarre events as one of them tries to invite the spirit of a family member.

Title: Border
Review Data: An investigative crime thriller.

Title: Dhaya
Review Data: Rudrayya, a retired soldier, wants to settle scores with Sharada Amma, a woman who runs an orphanage. He hires Dhaya who disguises himself as Sharada Amma's driver while planning her downfall.

Title: University
Review Data: This movie is about a socially awkward college student named Gandhi (Jeevan), who cannot seem to have joyful social interactions with people. He greatly differs from his peers-he doesn't smoke, drink or participate in any vices, which immediately sets him apart when it comes to friendships.

Title: Bayam Oru Payanam
Review Data: A passionate photographer, who gets stuck in a terror-stricken atmosphere, tries to save himself and his family from an unknown evil force.

Title: Sinthamal Sitharamal
Review Data: Sinthamal Sitharamal Cast: Abbas, Nadhitha Music: Barani Year: 2004

Title: Atti
Review Data: Bava lives in a lower middle class tenement in Triplicane, Chennai. He runs a water can business along with his friends. He also sings Gana songs in death ceremonies. During one such occasion he crosses swords with a local thug Mookuthi and gets a mobile phone while running for his life on the road. The owner of the mobile phone is the heroine and she wants it back. Bava’s repeated attempts to meet her and hand over the mobile fail due to various reasons and when he finally meets her with the mobile, he is brutally attacked by a group of goons and the mobile goes missing again.A local paid killer Radha is hired by a wealthy builder to kill Bava and snatch the phone from him. Whether Bava manages to escape the bid to kill him? What happen to the mobile phone and what is the reason behind the phone becoming a threat to his life? These questions are answered in the rest of the film.

Title: Maiem
Review Data: Three people are trapped inside an ATM on the outskirts of the city with a stranger waiting outside to attack them. With no means to seek help, can they get out alive?

Title: Aivaraattam
Review Data: A village's junior and senior teams compete against one another for the cup in a football tournament. But there's more at stake here as the team has stepbrothers playing against each other, and warring brothers as coaches.

Title: Kangaroo
Review Data: Murugesan aka Kangaroo cares so deeply for his sister Azhagu, whom the local pimp Ticket is lusting after. And then, when the men Azhagu agrees to marry die one after the other in seemingly natural circumstances, questions arise. Who murdered them and to what end?

Title: Azhagai Irukkirai Bayamai Irukkirathu
Review Data: Mano loves Jo but when he realises that Jo is in love with Prem, he decides to help her in winning Prem's love.

Title: Mayanginen Thayanginen
Review Data: Mayanginen Thayanginen starring nithin sathya & Disha Pandey of Thamizh Padam fame.Hero is a call taxi driver,the character is an extrovert who falls in love with a telephone operator. It’s an interesting love story with a twist with ample scope for experimentation with emotions.

Title: Suzhal
Review Data: The story is set around a young man. prabhu, an engineering college student and his friends including five girls.

Title: Thaalikaatha Kaaliamman
Review Data: Bose (Prabhu) and his cousin Pandi (Pandiarajan) come to a village to discover the miracles of the village's Goddess.

Title: Perumal
Review Data: The movie begins in a hospital, where a mafia is involved in adulterating drugs. Unfortunately, a junior doctor (Meenakshi) manages to stumble upon their anti-social act. To safeguard themselves, the gang sets out to wipe out the junior doctor.  She meets Perumal (Sundar C), a petty thief who does the job of recovering loan for an agency. He eventually vows to protect the junior doctor from her distress by putting an end to the gang and their atrocities.

Title: First Nights
Review Data: A narrative 4-chapter anthology featuring 7 couples with one backdrop - their first night of marriage.

Title: Thai Nilam
Review Data: A father and his daughter came to India as refugees post-war in their country. Few good hands help them to rebuild their lifestyle.

Title: Naaye Paeye
Review Data: Four friends, who kidnap a girl for ransom, get the shock of their life after realising that she is a ghost.

Title: Pallavan
Review Data: Pallavan, a happy go lucky college student cum ruffian falls in love with Meena during one of his bus journeys to college. But she is in love with Pallavan's younger brother, who does not have the guts to express his love. Pallavan does not realize that his dream lover is his brother's secret object of love!  Another twist is that Meena is a minister's daughter and has a twin sister. What transpires later forms the crux of the story.

Title: Amanuda Bhayam
Review Data: This film shows the research project of a parapsychology student named Abdul who visits a haunted forest with his friend Subramani.

Title: Ettu Thikkum Para
Review Data: Ambedkar, a social activist, gets involved in the dark side of the government. As a result, his son and friends are killed. A lower caste individual desires to marry a girl from a higher caste. A woman leaves for Chennai to marry the man of her choice. A man is in need of Rs 20,000 to save his son's life. How these separate stories interact forms the rest of the story.

Title: Puli Varudhu
Review Data: Ramesh (Githan ramesh) son of Manivannan and Saranya. Manivannan is the leading Ad-Film maker. Karupa (Karunaas) and other friends stay in Ramesh's house as paying guests. Ramesh's parents treat them as their own. Manivannan and Saranya desperately want their son to fall in love and get married. Ramesh prefers arranged marriage.A mutual friend of Ramesh and Karunaas is getting a fixed marriage. Along with Karunaas, Ramesh goes to their friend's village to attend the marriage. On the way there he dreams he meets a beautiful girl, but also that his friend would die in an accident....

Title: Coffee Cafe
Review Data: This film features four stories of four characters connected to each other. Vinothini an independent divorcee runs a coffee café and creates modern plays based on the street play 'Therukoothu. Kaveri, a 40-year-old transgender works at the coffee shop as housekeeping. Senthil an independent filmmaker who struggles for his debut film is in a financial crisis. Pooja, a freaky girl wants to live life on her terms and on one particular night, an incident makes them all connect which one leads the plot.

Title: Kannula Kaasa Kattappa
Review Data: A drama film directed by Major Gowtham, starring Aravind Akash, Ashwathy Ravikumar and Chandini Tamilarasan in the lead roles.

Title: Geethaiyin Raadhai
Review Data: A romantic Indian comedy that tells the story of a girl who finds the hero of her life and the two of them eventually fall in love with each other. However, they must also work together to overcome the hardship in their journey of love.

Title: Aaruthra
Review Data: Shattered by his sister’s cruel murder, a sculptor awards death punishments to those who are behind the brutal act in different ways

Title: Azhagiya Pandipuram
Review Data: Azhagiya Pandipuram is a Tamil comedy movie released on Dec 5th 2014. Elango Nagarajah and Anjena Kirti were in the leading role along with M.S Baskar, Manobala, Panju Subbu, Sriman, Devadarshini, Meera Krishnan, Fathima Babu, Yuvarani and many others. The movie was directed by N.Rayan and produced by N.Kirubakaran under the banner of Thaimann Production. Bharathwaj composed 5 songs and background music for this film. The film was shot in the Theni, Karaikkudi and Kodaikanal areas in Tamil Nadu.

Title: Kayiru
Review Data: A man goes with his cow to foretell the fortunes and fate of the people's home that he visits happens to fall in love with a local woman which stirs up a lot of trouble for them.

Title: Meendum Oru Mariyathai
Review Data: A girl who decides to commit suicide owing to personal issues befriends a septuagenarian who has been abandoned by his son. A 10-day trip to an exotic place changes their respective lives.

Title: En Sangathu Aala Adichavan Evanda
Review Data: A comedy film directed by Naveen Manikandan, starring Vikkas, Madhumitha, Ramar and Rahul Thatha in the lead roles.

Title: Nungambakkam
Review Data: The story based on the sensational Swathi murder case. Nungambakkam title refers to the railway station in Chennai where the 24-year-old software engineer Swathi was stabbed to death. Swathi was murdered when she was waiting for the train in the morning at the Nungambakkam railway station on June 24, 2016.

Title: Kalavu Thozhirchalai
Review Data: An idol smuggler comes to a village to steal a valuable idol and convinces a local small-time thief to help him. Do they succeed?

Title: Unmaiyen Velicham
Review Data: A thriller film directed by PK Sivakumar, starring Kirthi Krishna, Nizhalgal Ravi and Vijay Aathik in the lead roles.

Title: Pattipulam
Review Data: Due to street racing by local guys, a girl looses her parents and she takes revenge on the street racer!

Title: Thulli Vilayadu
Review Data: Three friends - an aspiring businessman, a wannabe actor and a small-time politician - are trying their best to get a break that can change their lives for the better. In a windfall, they get Rs18 crore which belongs to politician Saamy Malai (Jayaprakash). Malai seeks thug Singamuthu's (Prakash Raj) help to trace the money.

Title: Papparapaam
Review Data: Papparapaam traces the life of a man who wakes up at his funeral.

Title: 120 KMPH
Review Data: Jenny, who works in an IT company, is an acquaintance of Actress Shruthika. When Jenny decided to become an actress, she turned to Sruthika for help. Shruthika promises to help him, if she agrees to some conditions.

Title: She's No More
Review Data: This film is dedicated to all the youngsters who have lost their lives

Title: Haiku Love
Review Data: The film is inspired by Maestro Ilaiyaraaja's use of counterpoint in the song 'En Kanmani' from Chittu Kuruvi (1978).

Title: Meippada Sei
Review Data: Four ignorant boys were surviving their life with the support of parents in Tanjore village, one of them (Muthupandi) falling in love, thereby, opposition occurring, cause of lower & upper casting and racism, then how he got marry with his girlfriend moreover, to escaping from their parents, the couple has decided to moved towards Chennai along with friends of muthupandi, After arrival at Chennai before start-up of their life over there, unfortunately, they found the injured hand of the someone’s body in dead condition at the back side of their residence, scared and reported to the nearby police station, accordingly, they got assaulted by concerned local gangster. The Meippada Sei Climax would be illustrated: Whether the criminal has been punished by Indian law? Or Ignorant / village people? And how are they rejoining their families? The movie will be a family entertainer and contains the 4 fights & 4 songs, moreover with the message of sexual harassment/ abuse for society.

Title: Oonkaram
Review Data: Set against the backdrops of Madurai city,the story revolves around a girl ,who pursues a graduation course at a private college,where she undergoes sexual harassment.Her attempts to raise her voice against these evil miscreant  go eclipsed due to the strong influence of money and the domination of the ruling class  During this juncture , She meets a social activist named puli and shares pathos. The crux of the film is all about the attempts of the character’ puli ‘ who want to seek justice for the sake of this innocent girl and bring the evildoers before the law

Title: Dear Death
Review Data: What if that death is a person, and has a perspective, what if death explains or narrates his point of view. Death explains the stories of four people he met.

Title: V3
Review Data: Human rights commission of India appoint Sivagami, an ex-IAS officer, to interrogate the police officials in-charge of the encounter of five youngsters,  for allegedly raping and murdering an innocent girl, Vindhya and find out what had actually happened. Sivagami's interrogation leads to a series of revelations that shock Sivagami and the parents of the youngsters who died in the encounter.

Title: Enjoy
Review Data: The domination of social media which paves the way for opportunities for everyone to express their thoughts and opinions freely not only provided vast benefit to the audience but it also created waves of disaster in the society.  To present themselves with fashion and prestigious gadgets,  few youngsters step into this new technological world with the intention changing their lives overnight. Was this actually an opportunity to transform their lives or absolute disaster waiting in the dark shades is the story of ENJOY that will reveal.  A strong social message and multitude of complications intertwined in the story, the director chose adult comedy with intense materials of laughter through youngster’s language of new technological era.  The movie will make you laugh, cry and reshape your belief of the current events happening in everyone's home.

Title: Katchikkaaran
Review Data: A party cadre, who is very loyal to his leader and works very hard for the party  and does not  even care about anything else including his personal life. When the same cadre is affected by the actions of the same leaders, he rises against him

Title: Project C (Chapter 2)
Review Data: An unemployed youngster gets a job that puts his life in a Topsy Turvy Game.

Title: Estate
Review Data: A journalist, along with her colleagues, decides to investigate the Covelone Estate, which is believed to be haunted. What follows is a series of events that puts their lives in danger.

Title: The Rat
Review Data: Alphonse Puthren's Segment from "Aviyal"(Treasure)

Title: Pambattam
Review Data: Not found any data about this movie

Title: The Angel
Review Data: A Clash between a Gangster and A Police happens in Chennai.

Title: Powder
Review Data: A tale of five breathtaking and ravaging events occurring in one night. Samy murdering the man who cheated his daughter; A bunch of youngsters murder a local politician, butcher and transporting his remains in tea cans; A doctor is driving away hours before her wedding to settle an unfinished business; Parattai an out of work make-up man gets his hands dirty to earn some money; and there’s a burglar duo, and then there’s a cop,  Raghavan NM, who tries hard to bind these threads together.

Title: Dhammam
Review Data: A Buddhist parable about a Father and Daughter

Title: What Happened
Review Data: Nalan's first short film comedy based on his college memories

Title: Nenjuku Neethi
Review Data: Nalan Kumarasamy's first short film project for Naalaiya Iyakunar

Title: Facebook
Review Data: The Present generation story of how facebook plays a role in people's life

Title: Athiyayam
Review Data: Based on the touching short story by Melanmai Ponnusamy.  A Family Man gets into addiction of alcohol and finds hard to feed his family

Title: Valentine @3
Review Data: An anthology of stories following three gay men in different stages of their journey through life and love. The first story narrates a teenager’s feelings towards his school and college crush, and his mother’s understanding of his sexuality. The second story deals with two gay men deciding to get married in an unexpected context. The third story will follow a conversation between a cab driver and his passenger.

Title: Winter Opera
Review Data: An amateur writer has been working on his book for the past 2 years, but things take a turn when he starts to question his talent and ambition.

Title: College Road
Review Data: Ajay, a college student develops software to help nab cyber criminals. At the same time, a cyber crime spree is happening in Chennai. The story revolves around Ajay's college days as he develops the software, falls in love, and heads toward his future. Will he be able to capture the criminals with his software

Title: Film - The film
Review Data: Casteism. Hot gay sex. Infidelity. Social Message .  The film has it all.

Title: Oru Nalla Tamizh Paatin Mudhal Vari
Review Data: A film on Procrastination made by Procrastinating a bit too much.

Title: Sanjeevan
Review Data: A thrilling snooker game leads Nilan and his friends on a road trip that leads to an unexpected turn of events.

Title: Aattral
Review Data: A mechanical engineer has an aim of inventing unmanned car and his father manages to get money required for project, but dies in a road accident.  A robbery attempt stopped by him leads him to the suspicion about his father's death.He sets out to find the truth with his unmanned car named Roger.

Title: MITTA MIRASU
Review Data: Chellaiya is at loggerheads with his uncle Masilamani and his two sons for backstabbing his father. Things take a turn when Chellaiya's brother and his wife grow closer to their uncle's family.

Title: Banda Paramasivam
Review Data: Pandiyan and Cheran are step brothers. They want to outdo each other in everything. When they try to marrying off their daughters the fun starts.

Title: Veerapuram 220
Review Data: Veerapuram 220 film directed by  B. Senthil Kumar

Title: KADAL
Review Data: A girl standing alone in the beach remembers moments with her ex at the same place .Yet even in solitude she finds peace

Title: Viyuham
Review Data: A group of friends with dreams planned to loot a huge amount from a businesswoman by kidnapping her husband.

Title: Not Reachable
Review Data: Cops got a notification through the kavalan app that an IT girl was kidnapped. when the police arrived the spot the girl got murdered but cop was confused that the victim is not a kidnapped girl.  Then where is the kidnapped girl?  An interesting conclusion covered by a psycho lesbian killer...

Title: Padam - The Film
Review Data: Three sets of college students react to a pending film assignment

Title: My Dear Lisa
Review Data: In a remote locality, A spirit is out to seek revenge. During the run, a lot of deaths happen around. Can the revenge be fulfilled or will the spirit be captured?

Title: Vattakara
Review Data: Senthil,  Tharun, Mani , and Madhavan coincidentally meet on one journey and become good friends. To come out of their struggles and personal problems in their life finally, they collaborate with each other and made a plan to rob the Vattakara.

Title: Polama Oorgoolam
Review Data: This movie is inspired by a real-life incident that happened in North Chennai. A veteran football player embarks on a journey to fulfill the desire and dream of his ladylove. The film narrates his experience of his journey comprising many interesting events he encounters on his journey. This journey is filled with some unexpected twists and surprises along with the racy football game moments that will keep the viewers engrossed throughout.

Title: Sivi 2
Review Data: Police are informed by the parents of their missing children. Hence the police go in search of the students to last located area. There they find the belongings of the students.(cell phones ,cameras). Now are the footage and videos are real?

Title: Therkathi Veeran
Review Data: Saarath, a rich, upright and helpful youth, concerned about the welfare of coastal fishermen of his area, takes care of their problems with his friends. His actions rewards not only the love of his life, but also a long list of enemies.  At one point,Saarath's enemies get together and kill one of his friends and frame him for the murder and implicate the police. Can Saarath able to prove his innocence and recover from the crime of murder?

Title: Marijuana
Review Data: Marijuana is a Tamil movie released on 13 Mar, 2020. The movie is directed by MD Anand and featured Rishi Rithvik, Asha Parithalom and Powerstar Seenivasan as lead characters.

Title: Bestie
Review Data: A couple on a date at a beach resort experiences strange events and the incidents repeat again as they get stuck in a time loop of sorts.

Title: Galatta Ganapathi
Review Data: Being a cop Ganapathi has troubles getting married. He eventually falls for Nandhini, but his mom demands dowry which results into conflicts. Will Nandhini stand by Ganapathi?

Title: Thangam
Review Data: Thangam, a landlord who loves his sister, is forced to let her marry a man who impregnates her. However, when his sister is killed despite all his sacrifices, he vows to avenge her death.

Title: Super Kudumbam
Review Data: Arun pretends to be married in order to get a house for rent. He picks Shanthi, an uncouth slum girl, to act as his wife. Eventually, circumstances change and they get actually married.

Title: Kaadal
Review Data: Vikram falls in love with different women at various stages of his life and with each experience, he bears the pain and emotions of separation.

Title: Foreign Sarakku
Review Data: Amaran and Harichandran started to show their talent by creating a network called Educated Intellectual Crime Network. They were assigned a mission called Foreign Sarakku which involved kidnapping a rapist-murderer and hide him from the police. Will the mission be successful?

Title: 7 ¹/²
Review Data: Yeman and chithra guptham coming earth to take one human soul but unfortunately some chain incidents happen and after that they take human soul or what happened next to them

Title: Oru Melisana Kodu
Review Data: Aamil, a talented yet denied substitute hand-baller decides to prove his talent, amidst all the challenges and subjugation faced due to his peers. Driven by his passion and desire he wants to represent his home team joining the main league and fulfil his wish. Will he succeed?

Title: Pothanur Thabal Nilayam
Review Data: Praveen, an ambitious entrepreneur, is pushed to race against the clock and find the stolen money within the next 36 hours to save his father’s reputation and his family. Will the family survive this life-threatening situation?

Title: Appavin Parisu
Review Data: An Electrician in desperation to keep up a promise he made to his son commits an offence at a client's house. The act pushes him into an uncomfortable confrontation where he has to uphold either his dignity or the promise.

Title: Thunikaram
Review Data: A notorious child trafficker gets into an ambulance putting the life of a family at risk. Will the family fight him or succumb to the antagonist's evilness?

Title: Kaari
Review Data: Kaari revolves around the life of a horse jockey in Chennai and how fate brings him to a small village in Ramanad district, who is about to witness the cruelty of money and power.

Title: Witness
Review Data: With the world of conservancy workers at its center, Witness presents a never-seen-before view of metropolitan cities and the invisible corridors of power lying underneath them.

Title: The confession of a motor
Review Data: A motor narrates the events and a murder that happened in its room with its own innocent perception of the world. The film also explores about the duality/double standards of men.

Title: PAPER ROCKETS
Review Data: A boy gets to interact with an anonymous person who paints his portraits and throws them at him, hiding their identity. The boy forms an affection towards the person and when he finally learns the real identity of the person, it shocks him. What did he do after that is the rest of the story.

Title: TORROT
Review Data: If dreams arrive in sleep where do we arrive in dreams?

Title: My Caste
Review Data: My Caste is a documentation of the experiences of people coming to learn their own caste at various intersections in their lives.  Victims of caste atrocities from different parts of the state of Tamilnadu share their violations in the hands of police, caste Hindus and men. Some of the stories are brutal, some are subtle and some are psychological and all are violent.

Title: Sandikuthirai
Review Data: Few unlawful men threaten to destroy the lives of young students involved in an intimate photograph which later turns into a murder.

Title: Goddesses
Review Data: Lakshmi is a professional singer and dancer at funerals. Krishnaveni makes her living by burying and cremating unclaimed dead bodies from the rivers and streets. Sethuraku never went to school and instead took to the sea at an early age.

Title: Yaaro
Review Data: John is a loner, who is being framed for a series of murders; himself becomes a target of an unknown murderer who is dangerous and insanely brutal. As the murderer’s presence is felt everywhere, he must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical challenges on his ability to unravel the mystery of murders around him.

Title: Saayam

Title: Game

Title: Unnai Kann Theduthe
Review Data: When policemen find a corpse in a river with a wedding invitation stuffed in the pocket, they set out to investigate.

Title: Unnai Kann Theduthey
Review Data: The police find a dead body in a river holding on to a 'thaali' and a wedding invitation. They begin an investigation that takes them to a house where wedding preparations are in full swing.

Title: Suyetchai MLA

Title: Kattil
Review Data: The story revolves around the sentimental attachment of a family towards a cot that has been passed through the family for three generations. It has been their family’s companion through their ups and downs for around 250 years and everyone are attached to it emotionally. It has survived as a unperishable common identity link or reference passed from one generation to the next within the family. It was a place for last breadth for some and first breadth for some. Thus, the non living entity becomes a living one among the family members by the memories itched by it in their minds.The screenplay is based on how the antique cot , which the family emotionally revere lose it and how they struggle to recover the same , whether they succeed or lose it forever ,is the question which is answered in the plot.

Title: The Nudity

Title: Nanba Nanba

The film was released on 27 December 2002 and received critical acclaim, winning Chandrasekhar the National Film Award for Best Supporting Actor.

Title: Mudhal Mudhal Mudhal Varai

Title: Adigaram 79

When they happen to become confronting forces, what is at stake is much more than survival - friendship, love, honor and the legacy of an art form. A contemporary action-drama set against the backdrop of ancient Indian martial arts.

Title: ஆடி / Mirror

Title: Why do flowers die

Title: Sengadal
Review Data: Dhanushkodi, the Indo-Sri Lankan border town, is the crucible wherein History is brewing this concoction of defeated lives and exhausted dreams. Manimekalai, the filmmaker, Soori, a half-wit Sri Lankan Tamil Refugee, Munusamy, the fisherman, Rosemary, the social worker in Jesuit Christian Refugee Services, try hard to retain their sanity in this mad jumble. Their interactions with the dead or living refugees, their skirmishes with the Indian and Sri Lankan States, their personal lives overrun by external events - form the kernel of this narration.

Title: Thirupathisamy Kudumbam

Title: Mazhaikaalam

Title: Hawala

These 2 characters meet and become friends who later on get involved in hawala business and attract rivalry with a don by name Rana who is ruthless... What happens next is the climax of the movie.

Title: Yours Truly

Title: Thadayam Mudhal Adhyayam
Review Data: One of the crime scene turns out to be intriguing for the cop Mathivaanan which links to the series of previous murders with same pattern in the town. Further probing leads him into psychological distress before he gets his eyes on the devil for the intelligent battle.

Title: Our Family
Review Data: Set in Tamilnadu, India, ‘Our Family’ brings together excerpts from Nirvanam, a one person performance, by Pritham K. Chakravarthy and a family of three generations of trans-gendered female subjects, Aasha, Seetha and Dhana, who are bound together by ties of adoption. They all belong to the trans-gendered community called Aravanis (aka Hijras, in some parts of India). The film juxtaposes the ‘normality’ of their existence with the dark and powerful narrative by Pritham- ‘Nirvanam’; Nirvanam (Liberation) refers to the act of liberating oneself from the male body and transforming oneself to a female. This narrative bears witness to the tumultuous journey towards a reinvented selfhood, a journey fraught with violence, exploitation, affection and courage. The pains, pleasures and dilemmas of becoming the ‘other’ is the motif of the film. Weaving together performance, life histories and everyday life, it problematises the divides between ‘us’ and ‘them’.

Title: Physicality
Review Data: Krithika and Shireen are friends who strive for societal recognition of their preferred and lived gender. Shireen drives a taxi to support herself and nurses a dream to be a popular theater actress while Krithika is focused in her ambition to become a police officer. Soon both of them realize that the society and people around them can't think beyond the physicality of being a male and female.

Title: The Invisible Other: Caste in Tamil Cinema
Review Data: The Invisible Other is a documentary film that explores the presence of caste in films and film production in Tamil cinema, especially since the 1990s.

Title: Arunagiri Perumale
Review Data: A musical documentary chronicling the life of Arunagiri Nathar, a 15th century Tamil Mystic poet-saint. 'Arunagiri Perumale' is a collection of tales narrated by a contemporary musician, whose quest to explore the 'Thiruppugazh', unvcovers deeper layers in this historical work.

Title: Khyla

Title: Dancer

Title: Marina Puratchi
Review Data: Two aspiring reporters learn about the history and significance of jallikattu protest to secure a job in a private channel. The film begins with Sukanya (Shruti Reddy) and Parthasarathy (Naveen) attending an interview for the post of a reporter in a private channel. When the interviewer feels that they do not know much about the history of jallikattu and the protests which took place, he gives them two weeks' time to learn thoroughly about the bull-taming sport. The rest of the film is their presentation about jallikattu to the interview board.

Title: Karuthukalai Pathivu Sei
Review Data: Karuthukalai Pathivu Sei  is a 2019 Indian Tamil-language critically acclaimed social crime thriller film directed by Rahul Paramahamsa. The film stars newcomer SSR Aryan in the male lead role and Upasana RC in the female lead role. The theme of the film is based on the challenges and issues confronted by women in the society due to social media.[1] Principal photography of the film commenced in late 2018. The film was released on 13 December 2019 and opened to mixed reviews

Title: Unakkagathane

Rishi become greedy and try to cheat Shan with huge amount of commissions which belongs to Shan.Shan is very upset and angry with what have done by Rishi but he never take any action thinking both of them are very close friend since small age.One day one guy was shot dead by police in struggle, who involved in drugs shipments. Brother of dead person known as K7, who is leader of the international syndicate which is most wanted by police.When Rishi collide with K7,he wanted to killed and take revenge.

A trip to the 'agraharam' brings back memories of his childhood and he realises that he is in fact a Brahmin and the son of the head priest at the temple. Wishing to help his real family while at the same time unable to forget the parents who adopted him, he shuffles between the two vastly different worlds. Maheswar, a lower caste woman, waits for him back home while Gayatri falls in love with him in his new life.

Review Data: Tamil movie

Title: Ilai
Review Data: Ilai follows the story of a little Girl lost in a bustling metropolis. She doesn't speak the city's language and wanders about its hostile streets to find a way to her home. Lost and forlorn, she instinctively lures a kind baker, three young rag-picking boys and a feisty old woman into her search. Ilai encapsulates the lives of these reclusive characters as they zealously bond and set off unwittingly on a circular journey.

Title: Shakalaka Baby
Review Data: A mindless comedy movie which starts with kidnapping of two grooms on their wedding day by the brides and somehow ends with a spoof on Veerappan. Two unattractive grooms are married to two sisters. The guys get henpecked and they don't have a happy marriage. Enters Shakalaka baby who attracts both the grooms and their father in law.  What transpires later forms the crux of the story.

Title: Super Da
Review Data: Kathirvel comes to the city to live with his friend Subramani. While Reshma is a soft-spoken college student, her mother Gangamma is an heartless lady rowdy. Rahul, a college student, falls in love with Reshma at the first sight. Reshma also loves him but to save Rahul's life, she tries to avoid him. Finally, Reshma accepts his love. Gangamma, knowing their love affair, hurts heavily Rahul in front of Kathirvel and Subramani and they reached Rahul to the nearby hospital. Reshma insults Kathirvel for being passive during the attack and Kathirvel tells his tragic past to Reshma. In the past, Kathirvel was in love with Reshma's sister Meenakshi. They So Gangamma tried to kill Kathirvel but Meenakshi intervened and was accidentally by her mother. Before her death, Kathirvel promised Meenakshi to not kill her mother. Kathirvel is now determined to unite the lovers. What transpires later forms the crux of the story.

Title: Saranalayam
Review Data: Saranalayam is a Tamil movie released on 26 Jan, 2018. The movie is directed by Irasu Jaganathan and featured Ashwin Kumar and Sri Priyanka as lead characters

Title: Vidhi Mathi Ultaa
Review Data: A youngster has a nightmare and gets the shock of his life when the events from the dream start happening in his real life.

Title: Maniyaar Kudumbam
Review Data: A father and son, who hail from a respectable family, borrow huge sum from villagers to start a business. They face the wrath of villagers when they lose the money
Story about five Rajinikanth fans and their journey.

Title: Madura Veeran
Review Data: Durai returns to his village from Malaysia after 20 years in the pretext of getting married. However, his prime aim is to conduct jallikattu along with the panchayats of five neighbouring villages and fulfill his father's dream. Will he succeed?

A doctor whose colleagues a lady doctor (who fell in love with him) and another male doctor got murdered under mysterious circumstances, is happy to get back his ancestral house. But since an image of a woman keeps recurring in his mind, he's branded as mentally unfit and those around him decide to admit him in a hospital. What happened to the doctor in the end? Who's that woman he keeps getting images of?

Title: Uruthikol
Review Data: A school dropout tries to track down the men who might have kidnapped his sister.

Title: Manusangada
Review Data: When a caste discrimination prevents a villager from giving his deceased father a rightful burial, he takes his fight for equality to court.

Title: Keikraan Meikkiran
Review Data: Keikraan Meikkiran is a Tamil movie released on 19 May, 2017. The movie is directed by Sam Emmanuel and featured Sabapathi, Aadukalam Naren and Pandi as lead characters. Other popular actors who were roped in for Keikraan Meikkiran are Jangiri Madhumitha and Sabitha Anand.

Title: Veeraiyan
Review Data: A teenage student, who fails to live up to the expectations of his doting father, seeks the help of a few anti-social people to continue his education.

Title: Ka..Ka..Ka.. Aabathin Arikuri
Review Data: Ka..Ka..Ka.. Aabathin Arikuri is a Tamil movie starring Nassar and Yogi Babu in prominent roles. It is an horror drama directed by Manon M.

Title: Savarikkadu
Review Data: Savarikkadu is a Tamil movie starring Robo Shankar and Swathi in prominent roles. The cast also includes Soori and Alva Vasu. It is a drama directed by MN Krishnakumar with A. T. Indiravarman as the music composer, forming part of the crew .

Title: 9C Oslo
Review Data: Full tamil movie produced in Norway, Oslo. This is the second movie of the Nt pictures film producent. Filming, editing colouring done by Nt pictures studio by Thuruban.

Title: Kadikara Manithargal
Review Data: The struggles of a poor family forced to rent a house owned by a cruel landlord.

Title: Cinema Veeran
Review Data: An ode to the fighters and stunt coordinators of Tamil cinema, this documentary, with a voice-over by Rajinikanth, showcases the life of these unsung warriors.

Title: Palaivana Solai
Review Data: Autorickshaw driver Prabhu, Rich kid Yuvan, aspiring actor Aadhi, shorts-eats maker Ramana and under-used junior lawyer Iniyan are your usual men-on-the-compound wall type, rough hewn but basically good. Their singular aim is to make Priya fall for them. But behind Priya's smiling and cheerful face is a sad tale. She has an irreversible heart condition.

Title: Arasakulam
Review Data: Arasakulam a romantic thriller film directed by Kumar Maran, starring Rathan Mouli and Nayana Nair in the lead roles.

Title: Pattinapakkam
Review Data: When his plans go terribly wrong, an engineering graduate ends up becoming a target for powerful people which begins to affect the lives of the people around him in unimaginable ways.

Title: Kanna Pinna
Review Data: It is about a boy from Trichy who is bent upon marrying a beautiful girl. His friends say that he can find attractive girls only in Chennai — and hence he sets out in search of someone! The experiences he undergoes narrated in a hilarious way forms the rest of the movie. It starts with a director, cameraman, and music composer who go in search of a script, after finding a producer.

Title: Panchamirtham
Review Data: Taking a leaf from Hindu mythology, it revolves around Mareecha, Ravanan's brother and Idumban. Mareecha and Idumban both love Mandakini. But Mandakini loves Mareecha. Hence Mareecha and Idumban often cross swords with each other. Mareecha in the guise of a deer to attract Sita is killed by Lord Rama and according to a curse turns into a rock. Years later, cut to the present day, he is freed from this curse, when Sita, a young woman falls on this rock. Mareecha takes it upon himself to protect Sita at all times. Sita works as a secretary to Rajaram, an estate owner. When she realizes that Rajaram's relatives were milking him of his wealth, she tightens the purse strings, thereby earning their wrath. And in order to kill her, the relatives hire Pandi, who butchers goats for a living.

Title: Lavakusa
Review Data: 2015 Telugu Movie

Title: Ayyanar Veethi
Review Data: Ayyanaar Veethi is a Tamil movie starring Yuvan and Sara Shetty in prominent roles. The cast also includes K Bhagyaraj and Meera Krishnan. It is a drama directed by Gipsy Rajkumar with P Senthil Vel as the producer and U.K. Murali as music director forming part of the crew.

Title: Julieum 4 Perum
Review Data: Four unlucky men steal a beagle that is considered to be lucky in the hopes of making money out of it. But the dog goes missing and the four have to deal with an international dog-kidnapping racket

Title: Ilai
Review Data: A school girl in a village that doesn’t believe in women empowerment faces innumerable hurdles on the day of her final exam.

Title: Sasanam
Review Data: Muthiah and his wife Visalakshi are a loving couple, and they come across Saroji who with no one to go for, takes refuge in Muthiah's house. Muthiah and Saroji develop soft corner towards each other. The rest is what transpires between the trio, exploring the nuances of an extra-marital affair.

Title: Naalu Peruku Nalladhuna Edhuvum Thappilla
Review Data: Three criminals are always on the lookout to make a quick buck. They brainwash a young man and use him to steal a large sum of money.

Title: Toilet
Review Data: Manual Scavenging is an all India Phenomenon. However, the Government of India is kind enough to enact Prohibition of Employment as Manual Scavengers and their Rehabilitation Act and implementing many schemes. But none of them failed to work as the caste system is paramount in the so called democratic constitutional India. This film Kakkoos elaborates on the deplorable status.

Title: Oru Mugathirai
Review Data: A psychiatric doctor is infatuated with a psychology student and turns into a psychopath!

Title: Lightman
Review Data: This film portrays the life of Lightmen in cinema. Lightmen are an Integral part and prominent among the 24 crafts in film industry but they stay isolated among the other technicians in the Industry.

Title: The Road
Review Data: Saalai (The Road), the story of one man's inner struggle, a Psychological Thriller based on an Idea driven by strange encounters, shot in -30°C FREEZING COLD and DANGEROUS landscape presented for the first ever time in Tamil Cinema.

Title: Nermugam
Review Data: Over half-a-dozen lover couples go missing and an Assistant Commissioner of Police takes up the investigation.

Title: Pattathari
Review Data: Five graduates who are friends while away their lives idly. In walks a girl who stirs things up.

Title: Thee Nagar
Review Data: Yamaha Murugan (Karan) is a do-gooder, who commands respect from student’s community for his good deed as students chairman in a city college. Unable to find a lucrative job, he sets up a tea shop in front of the college from here he passed out. Life goes smooth for Murugan until he comes across a corrupt cop FIR Murthy (Shanmugarajan). Murugan is targeted for no fault of his by FIR Murthy. Nadhiya (Udhayathara), a girl next door falls for Murugan's good conduct. Both develop romance. However a bloody duel between Murugan and Murthy brings a change in the former's life. The rest is the battle between the two to assert their supremacy over one other that ends with a riveting climax.

Title: Ilami
Review Data: Two villages which are at loggerheads over a deity decide to sort the issue out by holding a Jallikattu event, and this decision puts a romance hanging in the balance.

Title: Kallatam
Review Data: When the money needed for his daughter's operation is stolen, a desperate father seeks the help of an honest cop who tries to catch the criminals, retrieve the amount and in the process, save the girl.

Title: Pagiri
Review Data: The film deals with the conflict between a young man and his father; while the latter wants him to take up farming, the guy wishes to work in a bar!

Title: Karma
Review Data: A popular crime novelist's wife is murdered and he is been interrogated by the Crime Branch special investigation officer. The interrogation leads to various suspects who could have possibly killed the novelist's wife. But, to the interrogation officer there is more to what meets the eye, until the audience gets to know who done it.

Title: Chocobar
Review Data: Horror, Drama

Title: Yeidhavan
Review Data: After his sister’s dreams are shattered, an angry youngster takes on fraudsters who have commercialised the education sector for their selfish needs.

Title: Love Guru
Review Data: Love Guru is an upcoming Indian Tamil film directed by Puthuraja, starring Saravanan and Sanchita Shetty. The film also stars Pasupathy, M. S. Bhaskar and Kalabhavan Mani in pivotal roles. The film, which is based on a real life incident, was shooting its final scenes as of November 2015.

Title: Thollaikatchi
Review Data: Thollaikatchi is an upcoming Tamil romantic comedy film directed by M.Sadiq Khan. The film stars Ashwin Kakumanu and Janani Iyer in lead roles with Subbu Panchu, Konjam Nadinga Boss fame Aadhavan, Manobala, Mayilsamy playing supporting roles. The soundtrack is composed by Dharan Kumar. The film is produced by Raja Bala Senthil, B. Kayalvizhi under Kayalaalaya Movies.

Title: Kadalai
Review Data: A youngster with a lackadaisical attitude realises the importance of embracing agriculture when a selfish businessman tries to acquire land from his village.

Title: Inimey Nangathan
Review Data: Four Kathakalakshepam friends and artistes - Vichu, Varadhu, Vaithi and Govind want to become rich and famous. Their hunger for wealth leads them to a Swami who claims to make them rich overnight.

Title: Ka Ka Ka Po
Review Data: The life of a young and charming girl who possesses 'special powers' turns topsy-turvy after she encounters an unexpected incident.

Title: Meera Jaakirathai
Review Data: A visual communication student sets out to trace the mysterious story behind an infamous bridge with his friends, and ends up with interesting revelations.

Title: Avan Aval
Review Data: The story is based on real life incidents and is a revenge thriller with lot of suspense. A husband wants to take revenge for an extramarital affair, his wife has. The way a mysterious girl befriends him and helps his endeavour, forms the crux of the story.

Title: Saalaiyoram
Review Data: Saalaiyoram is a hard hitting movie which shows the difference between high-society people and low class people. High class people throw away garbage daily. Low class people make a living out of cleaning their garbage.

Title: Unakkul Naan
Review Data: Unakkul Naan plays out through the mind of a young boy who, while watching a film at the theater where his father works as a projectionist, is sent back to school by his father. The boy then embarks on a fantastical journey wherein he experiences the joy of childhood while also coming to understand the reality of human life and its elements. This is a highly experimental feature film was shot inside theatre.

Title: Kai
Review Data: The film is about two brothers, who lose their mother at a very young age. The elder one, Kai turns a goon in order to earn a living and to take care of his brother.

Title: Navarasa
Review Data: The film revolves around the story of a young girl Shweta (P. Shwetha) taking her first steps towards adulthood. Ready for the adventure, the thirteen-year-old is upbeat, however soon discovers that every night, her uncle Gautam (Kushboo) transforms himself into a woman to lead a completely different life.

Title: Tea Kadai Raja
Review Data: The story centers around boys who live next door to each other and revolves around a love affair of one of the boys in his semi urban backdrop.

Title: Adida Melam
Review Data: A down-on-luck wedding planner tries to save a girl from a criminal who plans to marry her with revenge on his mind.

Title: Suththi
Review Data: A spoof of the Tamil film Kaththi, Suththi highlights the toilet problem in rural areas of south India.

Title: 9 Thirudargal
Review Data: 9 Thirudargal (nine thieves) is a Tamil language comedy movie directed by Vijay Paramasivam and starring Saran, Akansha Mohan and Y. G. Mahendra.

Title: Radiopetti
Review Data: Radiopetti, the story of a man lost in another world, a world of the past, brought alive to his ears by a radioset. How his life journeys with his love for this inanimate thing alongside his family and friends. Where will this love take him?

Title: Naalu Peru Naalu Vithama Pesuvanga
Review Data: Naalu Peru Naalu Vidhama Pesuvanga is an upcoming 2016 Tamil movie directed by L. Madhavan. It stars Indrajith and Devika in lead roles.

Title: Ice
Review Data: Ice is a 2003 Tamil romantic film directed by R. Raghuraj. The film starred Ashok and Priyanka Trivedi in the lead roles, while Vivek and Mouli appeared in other pivotal role. The film produced by Joy Entertainment, had music scored by Devi Sri Prasad.

Title: Enkitta Mothathe
Review Data: Two cut-out artists who idolize Tamil Superstar's Rajinikanth and Kamal Hassan face a challenge in the form of a bigwig who challenges them.

Title: Sagunthalavin Kadhalan
